ComicInfo.Title: Belly of the Worm
ComicInfo.Summary: The conclusion to what's sure to be the most talked about book of the year! Boarding a gigantic luxury liner to take over wasn't supposed to be so hard especially with only four thousand flesh hungry zombies on the loose. What will be the fate of our nine survivors on board, and will anybody be alive when it's all over to care!?
ComicInfo.Writer: Mel Smith,Paul H. Birch,Clark K. Castillo,Mel Smith,Paul H. Birch,Clark K. Castillo
